channel.title: Looking To Make Server With Someone
channel.description:
Hey after close too a year of quiting moparscape i'm back. Looking for a good hoster, that can hold 30 people at least no lagg, and is an okay coder.
I'm just getting back into the hang of things, and looking too make a pk server. Not complicated at all, basic training, good shops, 1 pk zone, and most importantly no lagg.
AND NO HAM. I can help you get a no-ip to protect your i.p.
Pm me if your interested, or post.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 01:52:43 PM[/size][hr]O and this is a new account, my previous one (Zzz O zzZ) got hijacked and banned.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 02:01:32 PM[/size][hr]i'm thinking i want to work with 1 person, with 3 is gets complicated.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 16, 2007, 02:08:08 PM[/size][hr].......
